## MomentFormatComponent.setDefaultFormat() method

Sets the default format when input is cleared. Also used for placeholder.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setDefaultFormat(defaultFormat: string): this;
```

| <code>defaultFormat</code> | <code>string</code> |             |
